about_the_game: This DLC is meant for people who enjoy "Go Home, Mr. Fisk" and wish to support Klothscape's future endeavors. It does not radically alter the game: the DLC simply adds an extra accessory to the game and changes the main menu to reflect the purchaser's status as a supporter. Only buy this if you really like our work and want to show that gratitude.
detailed_description: This DLC is meant for people who enjoy "Go Home, Mr. Fisk" and wish to support Klothscape's future endeavors. It does not radically alter the game: the DLC simply adds an extra accessory to the game and changes the main menu to reflect the purchaser's status as a supporter. Only buy this if you really like our work and want to show that gratitude.
name: Go Home, Mr. Fisk - Supporter DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3-5005U
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The above are the lowest specs we tested the game on, but any toaster should run this just fine.

short_description: DLC for people who want to support the developers of "Go Home, Mr. Fisk!" Contains a single extra accessory for the game.
